SEARCH
Module edu.ntnu.stud
Package edu.ntnu.stud.views

Class ChaosGameView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Scene
edu.ntnu.stud.views.ChaosGameView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class ChaosGameView extends javafx.scene.Scene
This class represents the view for the Chaos Game. It extends the View class and includes methods for creating and managing the UI components. The class uses the Observer pattern to notify the ChaosGameController about the user's actions.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChaosGameView

      public ChaosGameView(ChaosGameController chaosGameController)
      Constructor for the ChaosGameView class. Initializes the ChaosGameView with the specified ChaosGameController. Adds the ChaosGameController as an observer. Creates the Chaos Game canvas and sidebar.
      Parameters:
      chaosGameController - the ChaosGameController used to control the Chaos Game
